reviewText: this is the first iteration in the series. If you intend to view the series, I would recommend starting with The Shunning, then The Confession, and finally, The Reckoning. If I had anything negative to say it would be that I wish the same actors could have stayed true throughout the series. The only constant was Sherry Springfield who plays her role superbly. I highly recommend this series.
Purchased this movie for my wifes collection and she likes the movie.
Is a wonderful movie, the only thing I didn't like was the way the father and mother hid the truth from their adopted daughter. They should have told her when she was old enough.
